alert.note: Alert for Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 10:08AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Oxford and northwestern Cumberland Counties through 1045 AM EDT... At 1008 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fryeburg, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bridgton, Fryeburg, Naples, Hiram, Waterford, Casco, Harrison, Brownfield, Denmark, Sweden, Norway, Otisfield, Sebago, and Porter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Oxford
